item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple Acquires Pixelmator (97 points | 26 comments)
2. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (November 2024) (66 points | 71 comments)
3. Alexander the Great's tunic identified in royal tomb at Vergina (151 points | 77 comments)

5. Ink: React for Interactive CLI Apps (26 points | 5 comments)
6. ChatGPT Search (1358 points | 1127 comments)
7. A new dental scam is to pull healthy teeth to sell you expensive fake ones (117 points | 102 comments)

14. Oasis: A Universe in a Transformer (91 points | 33 comments)

16. Universe would die before monkey with keyboard writes Shakespeare, study finds (55 points | 93 comments)

23. Pythagora (GPT Pilot) (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)

26. CIL: C Intermediate Language (62 points | 24 comments)
27. Demystifying the regular expression that checks if a number is prime (2016) (112 points | 34 comments)
28. What is the point of an online conference? (121 points | 78 comments)
29. Democratising publishing (150 points | 39 comments)
30. Fuzzing between the lines in popular barcode software (175 points | 51 comments)
